author: Staff Reporter
text:
The organisation that was responsible for nurturing the Dravidian movement in Tamil Nadu, Dravidar Kazhagam, will hold a state conference to protest against caste and untouchability in Siruganur, Tiruchi on March 19 and March 20, its president K. Veeramani announced on Thursday.

“The conference’s central theme would be about ‘caste and untouchability’. The conference which will focus annihilation of caste and untouchability will have the participation of leaders from across party lines,” said K. Veeramani, president, Dravidar Kazhagam.
title: DK meet in Tiruchi to focus on caste and untouchability
